Okay, here's the breakdown of required visual elements:

*   A human figure
*   A Japanese-style sword (e.g., katana)
*   A sword scabbard (saya)
*   Samurai-style attire (e.g., hakama, gi)
*   The figure depicted in a dynamic pose executing a sword draw and slash
*   Hand(s) gripping the sword hilt
*   Hand (or part of the body) interacting with the scabbard (consistent with a draw)
